mapper.select: SELECT `career_id` as `careerId`, `user_id` as `userId`, `career_start` as `careerStart`, `career_end` as `careerEnd`, `company` as `company`, `job_title` as `jobTitle`, `description` as `description` FROM `user_career` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user_career` ( `career_id`, `user_id`, `career_start`, `career_end`, `company`, `job_title`, `description`, `created`, `modified ) VALUES ( #{careerId}, #{userId}, #{careerStart}, #{careerEnd}, #{company}, #{jobTitle}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `career_start` = #{careerStart}, `career_end` = #{careerEnd}, `company` = #{company}, `job_title` = #{jobTitle}, `description` = #{description} `modified` = NOW()
